typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		agt_description as string,
		agt_key as string,
		last_updated_by as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['Pre_Dim/pre_dim_sub_claim_pa.parquet']) ~> PreDimSubClaim
PreDimSubClaim derive() ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow() ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		PK_KEY as string,
		CPT_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CPT_NUMBER as integer,
		INSERTED_BY as string,
		DATE_INSERTED as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimSubClaim
